item.title: CVE-2023-40055|2024-09-03T18:17:49.458Z -- solarwinds -- network%20configuration%20manager
item.description: The Network Configuration Manager was susceptible to a Directory Traversal Remote Code Execution Vulnerability. This vulnerability allows a low-level user to perform the actions with SYSTEM privileges.Â We found this issue was not resolved in CVE-2023-33227
